description: Jay was a shinobi of http://anidb.net/ch12205 [Kumogakure]. Jay is a bald man with a Flak Jacket with one strap over one shoulder, and a black shirt underneath. He also wear a sports sunglasses and a Forehead Protector with a white cloth. Jay and his partner discovered that http://anidb.net/ch13998 [Killer Bee] was fighting members of http://anidb.net/ch8599 [Akatsuki] while transformed into the Eight-Tailed Beast. He sent words of his discovery to the http://anidb.net/ch16171 [Fourth Raikage] and then used his messenger lizard to follow Killer Bee`s opponents. He was later discovered by http://anidb.net/ch7719 [Uchiha Sasuke] and http://anidb.net/ch9656 [Juugo] before being captured. Jay was later found slumped against the wall of the hideout by other Kumogakure shinobi, but his condition is unknown.
name: Jay
